Package dk.via.sep.server.networking.eventServerHandler

Class EventServerHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • dk.via.sep.server.networking.eventServerHandler.EventServerHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventServer, EventServerCallback, java.rmi.Remote
    public class EventServerHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements EventServer
    The event server that handles all the event related actions, such as adding, editing, removing, etc.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      EventServerHandler​(EventServerModel eventServerModel)
      Public constructor that initializes the event model and also makes this class remotely available for the client.

    • Constructor Detail

      • EventServerHandler

        public EventServerHandler​(EventServerModel eventServerModel)
        Public constructor that initializes the event model and also makes this class remotely available for the client.
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • registerGeneralClientCallback

        public void registerGeneralClientCallback​(EventClientCallback clientCallback)
        Method used to register a client to a general callback. A general callback will notify every active user of an event. Each callback will need it's own PropertyChangeListener created as a field variable, and it's own UserAction enum, and follow the structure shown below.
        Specified by:
        registerGeneralClientCallback in interface EventServerCallback
        Parameters:
        clientCallback - the client's callback interface, so it can be accessed by the server.

      • registerClientCallback

        public void registerClientCallback​(EventClientCallback clientCallback,
                                   java.util.UUID uuid)
        Method used to register a client to a private callback. A private callback will notify only the specified user, and no one else. If you need to send a private set of data, you need to provide the client's UUID which is created at start-up and changes every time the program is opened.
        Specified by:
        registerClientCallback in interface EventServerCallback
        Parameters:
        clientCallback - the client's callback interface
        uuid - the client's UUID

      • createEvent

        public void createEvent​(Event event)
        Method used to add an event into the database.
        Specified by:
        createEvent in interface EventServerCallback
        Parameters:
        event - the event to be added.

      • removeEvent

        public void removeEvent​(Event event)
        Method used to remove an event from the database. Note: the specified event needs to have attached to it an ID that has been assigned by the database, otherwise the DAO will throw an exception.
        Specified by:
        removeEvent in interface EventServerCallback
        Parameters:
        event - the event to be removed.

      • editEvent

        public void editEvent​(Event newEvent)
        Method used to edit an event from the database.
        Specified by:
        editEvent in interface EventServerCallback
        Parameters:
        newEvent - the event to be edited, along with the changes made to it.

      • getEventList

        public java.util.ArrayList<Event> getEventList()
        Deprecated.
        Use the async version instead.
        Method used to retrieve the event list from the database.
        Specified by:
        getEventList in interface EventServerCallback
        Returns:
        the event list.

      • getEventListASync

        public void getEventListASync​(java.util.UUID clientID)
        Method used to get the event list asynchronously. This method is called by the client, it will fetch the list from the database, then call another method on the client using a listener.
        Specified by:
        getEventListASync in interface EventServerCallback
        Parameters:
        clientID - the client's UUID, necessary to send back the list to the client that requested it.

      • joinEvent

        public boolean joinEvent​(User user,
                         Event event,
                         boolean b)
        Method used to join a user to an event.
        Specified by:
        joinEvent in interface EventServerCallback
        Parameters:
        user - the user to be added to an event.
        event - the event to add the user to.
        b - boolean if the user decides to ride the bus to the event or not.
        Returns:
        boolean if the operation was successful or not.

      • leaveEvent

        public boolean leaveEvent​(User user,
                          Event event)
        Method used to remove a user from an event.
        Specified by:
        leaveEvent in interface EventServerCallback
        Parameters:
        user - the user to be removed from an event.
        event - the event to be removed from.
        Returns:
        boolean if the operation was successful or not.

      • getUserList

        public java.util.ArrayList<User> getUserList​(Event event)
        Method used to retrieve the list of users from an event.
        Specified by:
        getUserList in interface EventServerCallback
        Parameters:
        event - the event to get the list from.
        Returns:
        boolean if the operation was successful or not.
